summary: Integration test suite that validates AWS EventBridge interactions using the Moto mock library, covering event bus forwarding rules, delivery of events to CloudWatch Logs, standard and FIFO SQS queues, and custom event bus configurations.
business_intent: To verify that eventâ€‘driven workflows built on EventBridge correctly forward events and integrate with downstream services such as CloudWatch Logs and SQS, ensuring reliable behavior in a mocked AWS environment.
